001package org.consensusj.bitcoinj.signing;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.Network;
004import org.bitcoinj.base.Sha256Hash;
005import org.bitcoinj.core.Transaction;
006import org.bitcoinj.script.Script;
007
008import java.util.List;
009import java.util.stream.Collectors;
010
011/**
012 * This represents the data in {@code signrawtransactionwithwallet}. Specifically
013 * inputs with UTXO hash and index and an empty scriptSig.
014 */
015public class RawTransactionSigningRequest {
016    private final Network network;
017    private final List<RawInput> inputs;
018    private final List<TransactionOutputData> outputs;
019
020
021    public static RawTransactionSigningRequest of(Network network, List<RawInput> inputs, List<TransactionOutputData> outputs) {
022        return new RawTransactionSigningRequest(network, inputs, outputs);
023    }
024
025    public static RawTransactionSigningRequest ofTransaction(Network network, Transaction transaction) {
026        List<RawInput> inputs = transaction.getInputs().stream()
027                .map(i -> new RawInput(i.getOutpoint().getHash(), (int) i.getOutpoint().getIndex(), i.getScriptSig()))
028                .collect(Collectors.toList());
029        List<TransactionOutputData> outputs = transaction.getOutputs().stream()
030                .map(TransactionOutputData::fromTxOutput)
031                .collect(Collectors.toList());
032        return RawTransactionSigningRequest.of(network, inputs, outputs);
033    }
034
035    public RawTransactionSigningRequest(Network network, List<RawInput> inputs, List<TransactionOutputData> outputs) {
036        this.network = network;
037        this.inputs = inputs;
038        this.outputs = outputs;
039    }
040
041    public List<RawInput> inputs() {
042        return inputs;
043    }
044
045    public List<TransactionOutputData> outputs() {
046        return outputs;
047    }
048
049    public static class RawInput {
050        private final Sha256Hash txId;
051        private final int index;
052        private final Script scriptSig;
053
054        /**
055         * @param txId id
056         * @param index index
057         * @param scriptSig typically is empty script (at least in {@code signrawtransactionwithwallet} case
058         */
059        public RawInput(Sha256Hash txId, int index, Script scriptSig) {
060            this.txId = txId;
061            this.index = index;
062            this.scriptSig = scriptSig;
063        }
064
065        public Sha256Hash txId() {
066            return txId;
067        }
068
069        public int index() {
070            return index;
071        }
072
073        public Script scriptSig() {
074            return scriptSig;
075        }
076
077        public Utxo.Basic toUtxo() {
078            return Utxo.of(txId, index);
079        }
080    }
081}
